segments.text: Tom , you look thoughtful and unhappy recently . What's wrong with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lily broke up with me last week . In fact , she dumped me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? I mean , why did she part company with you after seven years together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She said it was because we had very different ideas about life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course not . I knew she had fallen in love with another guy . It is difficult to see her move on so quickly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , buddy , cheer up . Why not do some sports with me ? Violent exercise might help to shake you out of your disappointment in love .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Steven . You are really a good friend .
segments.speaker: S2
